price: 41. Y también hicimos de la historia del pueblo de 'Ad un motivo de reflexión cuando enviamos sobre ellos un viento destructor
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
